tools.pki.gbay.crypto.texts

Class SignedText

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.pki.gbay.crypto.texts.BasicText
      • tools.pki.gbay.crypto.texts.PlainText
        • tools.pki.gbay.crypto.texts.SignedText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignedTextInterface

    public class SignedText
extends PlainText
implements SignedTextInterface
    A signed text which contains signed values and can be verified .
    Author:
    Araz Farhang
